sentences.chinese: 越王句踐，其先禹之苗裔，而夏后帝少康之庶子也。
sentences.literal: Yue wang Gou Jian, his ancestors Yu's descendants, but Xia Hou Di Shao Kang's concubine son.

sentences.chinese: 封於會稽，以奉守禹之祀。
sentences.literal: Enfeoffed at Kui Ji, to serve and guard Yu's sacrifices.

sentences.chinese: 文身斷發，披草萊而邑焉。
sentences.literal: They tattooed their bodies and cut their hair, cleared the grassy wilds and established cities there.
After more than twenty generations, it reached Yun Chang.

sentences.chinese: 允常之時，與吳王闔廬戰而相怨伐。
sentences.literal: Yun Chang's time, with Wu wang He Lu battled and mutually resented attacked.

sentences.chinese: 允常卒，子句踐立，是為越王。
sentences.literal: Yun Chang died, and his son Gou Jian was established. This was the Yue wang.

sentences.chinese: 元年，吳王闔廬聞允常死，乃興師伐越。
sentences.literal: In the first year, Wu wang He Lu heard that Yun Chang had died and then raised troops to attack Yue.

sentences.chinese: 越王句踐使死士挑戰，三行，至吳陳，呼而自剄。
sentences.literal: Yue wang Gou Jian sent death soldiers to challenge battle. In three rows, they reached the Wu battle lines, called out, and slit their own throats.

sentences.chinese: 吳師觀之，越因襲擊吳師，吳師敗於檇李，射傷吳王闔廬。
sentences.literal: The Wu troops watched this. Yue therefore raided and attacked the Wu troops. The Wu troops were defeated at Gui Li, and Wu wang He Lu was shot and injured.

sentences.chinese: 闔廬且死，告其子夫差曰：「必毋忘越。」
sentences.literal: He Lu about to die, told his son Fu Chai said: 'Certainly do not forget Yue.'

sentences.chinese: 三年，句踐聞吳王夫差日夜勒兵，且以報越，越欲先吳未發往伐之。
sentences.literal: In the third year, Gou Jian heard that Wu wang Fu Chai drilled troops day and night, moreover intending to repay Yue. Yue desired to attack it before Wu had not yet moved.

sentences.chinese: 臣聞兵者凶器也，戰者逆德也，爭者事之末也。
sentences.literal: I have heard that weapons are inauspicious instruments, battle is contrary to virtue, and contending is the end of affairs.

sentences.chinese: 陰謀逆德，好用凶器，試身於所末，上帝禁之，行者不利。」
sentences.literal: Secret plots contrary virtue, fond of using inauspicious instruments, test body at affairs end, Shang Di forbids it, doers unfavorable.'
Yue wang said: 'I have already decided it.'
